---
title: "Plots_with_sd_variables"
format: html
---

Load in necessary libraries:
```{r}
library(janitor)
library(tree)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
```

Read in dataset:
```{r}
library(here)
RL_numeric <- read_csv(here("RL_Datasets/RL_numeric.csv"), 
        col_types = cols(winner_factor = readr::col_factor()))
```

```{r}
ggpairs(data = RL_numeric, columns = c(46, 47, 48), 
        lower = list(combo = wrap(ggally_facethist, bins = 15)))
```
